title: Can't refund champ I got a skin for in Hextech?
body: Hey! I purchased Riven and got a skin for her which I upgraded via my level 5 chest, but I noticed I can't refund her now?

replies.body:
Yeeeaaa with how the system currently works you won't be able to get that champion refunded on your own without first refunding the skin.

Don't do that though! Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can get the champion refunded while leaving the skin for you to keep!
